abstract: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, Japan’s biggest bank, confirmed Thursday that it has scrapped plans to buy Citigroup’s Japan trust banking unit.
snippet: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, Japan’s biggest bank, confirmed Thursday that it has scrapped plans to buy Citigroup’s Japan trust banking unit.
lead_paragraph: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, Japan’s biggest bank, confirmed Thursday that it has scrapped plans to buy Citigroup‘s Japan trust banking unit, The Associated Press said.

headline.main: Mitsubishi UFJ Scraps Purchase of Citigroup Unit
